name: Project Galaxy (Working Name)
description:
yes i know the project name is terrible

This is a small demo thing of a game i'm making on Gdevelop 5! The enemy sprites are provided by the engine but will be changed in the future.

Right now the game's small as heck but i have some of stuff on the works i want to add soon. I wanna try to constantly update this little project to see how it does!

I appreciate feedback! Leave yours in the comments!

If you see a black screen, refresh the page!

PS4, Xbox and Generic controllers (Including Nintendo Switch Pro Controller) are supported!

- Credits -

Programming and Music by Me

Firewall by Boom Kitty

Pixel Art by Gdevelop, Noisi22 (Doesn't have Socials) and Me.

Level 2 background by Kenney

- Socials! -

Kenney

https://www.kenney.nl/

- Collabs and other stuff! -

This game is gonna be both a 2D space shooter and a platformer!

I also wanted to mention that i want to make a character selection menu, and i'm very interested in collabs! So if you want your super-duper cool OC in my small little game, DM me on Discord or Twitter and maybe they'll make it in!

If you can, provide pixel art and maybe walking, crouching and jumping animations of them since i'm not very good at pixel art myself. But a drawing or image of them is required ofc

- Next Update -

I don't know what will be on the next update but... Here's some stuff i wanna add!

  • More levels ofc!
  • Multiplayer!
  • A second part for Level 2
  • Character Selection Menu (As mentioned before)
  • Better Touch Controls
  • More settings
  • Cutscenes!
  • Full Controller support! (Cus right now it only works on levels)
  • Story Mode! (This one will take some time tho)

I hope you enjoy this small little game and thanks for playing!
